tr.td: DT.IMMZ.D2.DT.HepatitisB.3doses
Decision Table Determine required vaccinations
draft
WHO
computable

div.p: WHO recommendations for routine immunization – summary tables (March 2023) (1)

tr.td:
Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
The first and second (monovalent or as part of a combined vaccine) may given at the same time as the first and third doses of diphtheria–tetanus–pertussis (DTP)-containing vaccine. The interval between doses should be at least 4 weeks.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with first hepatitis B dose as client's age is not within appropriate age range. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination: Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with first hepatitis B dose as client's age is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the third dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination: Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete: Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete "Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete" "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Hepatitis B-containing vaccines")
–
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete for client whose weight at birth was over 2000 g and who was not premature infant. Two hepatitis B primary series doses were administered.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
A birth dose of hepatitis B-containing vaccine can be given to low-birth-weight (<2000 g) and premature infants. For these infants, the birth dose should not count as part of the primary 3-dose series; the 3 doses of the standard primary series should be given according to the national vaccination schedule.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the client was a low-birth-weight infant and the latest hepatitis B-containing vaccine was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the third dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination: Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the client was a low-birth-weight infant and the latest hepatitis B-containing vaccine administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the client was a low-birth-weight infant and the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination: Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the client was a low-birth-weight infant and the latest hepatitis B dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete: Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete '"Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete" "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Hepatitis B-containing vaccines")
–
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (The hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete for client whose weight at birth was below 2000 g and who was a premature infant. Four hepatitis B primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
